carpet.rule.dropEyesOfEnderFromEndPortal: A full end portal frame will drop an eye of ender when right clicked by a player, turning into an empty end portal frame in the process. Any connecting end portals will break.
A netherite axe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine wood and nether wood type blocks.
carpet.rule.netheritePickaxeInstantMineB: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine blue ice blocks.
carpet.rule.netheritePickaxeInstantMineC: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine cobblestone type blocks.
carpet.rule.netheritePickaxeInstantMineD: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine deepslate type blocks.
carpet.rule.netheritePickaxeInstantMineE: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine end stone type blocks.
carpet.rule.netheritePickaxeInstantMineN: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine nether brick type blocks.
carpet.rule.phantomsObeyHostileMobCap.de: Phantoms will no longer spawn if the hostile mobcap is full. This is per player.
carpet.rule.phantomObeyMushroomBiome.des: Phantoms will no longer spawn in a mushroom fields biome.
